Skill.label: KEEP THOSE IN SIDE SLOTS TO LEVEL
ACT. 2 keep links from Act. 1 and add:

PathOfBuilding.Notes:
==================================================================================================================================================================================================== ACT. 1
Kill Hillock - IMPORTANT
Look for B=B=G wand and movement speed boots ("nn" in search bar for runner - 10% ms).
Buy stormblast mine.
Medicine chest (Tidal island) ==> Quicksilver flask.
Take Lesser poison support, Frost bomb and Frost blink as quest rewards.
Buy Arcane Surge (DON'T LEVEL IT) and Orb of Storms (you can buy swift assebly too).
Link skills like in skill gem section.
While on move kill monsters with Frost bomb ==> Frost blink combo.
Leave portal in submerged passage next to bridge so you can go back and complete side quest after taking Lower Prison WP.
Kill Dweller (side quest in Flooded Depths).
Take Added Lightning Damage and link it with Stormblast Mine.
Upgrade new wands by doing this: a) sell Iron ring with any Green Skill Gem to get Topaz ring (do it twice) b) sell MAGIC WAND (use transmute on your wand if neccesary), orb of alteration and Topaz ring (normal rarity) You will get T8 added lightning dmg to spells mod. To improve your wands on the way you can sell magic wand with better rarity topaz rings just like above (magic ring gives T7 and rare gives T6 mod).
Finish Lab Trial (The Prison) and kill Brutus.
Take Flame dash and replace Frost blink. Level Blastchain mines on weapon swap.
Start using Vitality as soon as u meet STR requirements (buy STR belt if its needed).
Leave portal next to Ship Graveyard Cave. Do this quest after you take any WP in next locations.
While killing harded enemies throw Orb of Storms and just spam Blastchain mine while holding detonation key. Stay in Orb of Storms radius to proc it while using spells. Elemental overloard needs to be proced by Orb of Storms so never forget to use it.
Kill Marveil.
====================================================================================================================================================================================================
ACT. 2
If you don't have 2nd Quicksilver flask leave portal next to The Den. Grab WP in next location and do side quest.
COMPLETE EINHAR MISSION. You will need bestcrafting later.
If possible save 2 random essences to repeat wand vendor recipe at level 20.
Finish Lab Trial (Chamber of Sins level 2).
Kill Fidelitas and grab Herald of Thunder. Buy Summon Skitterbots.
Kill Kraityn.
Finish Lab Trial (The Crypt).
Kill Oak, Allira, and Weaver.
If you are lvl 20 do wand vendor recipe. Craft ressistances with crafting bench.
Finish Act. 2.
====================================================================================================================================================================================================
ACT. 3
Free and talk to Clarissa (don't forget to speak with her).
Finish Lab Trial (The Crematorium).
Kill Piety.
Finish Lab Trial (The Catacombs).
Every time you come back to town, check 4 links at vendor.
Progress just like normal till The Imperial Gardens (Finish Lab Trial there). Go to Library and finish quest to enable skill gem vendor. You can go there before next Piety encounter to grab new skills from Siossa.
Take Innervate (link with Orb of Storms). Buy smoke mine for Smoke Mine + Flame Dash combo. Buy Ball Lightning (finally), Charged mines and Slower Projectiles.
Finish Act. 3
====================================================================================================================================================================================================
ACT. 4
Kill Voll.
Grab Summon Stone Golem and finish first Lab.
Grab Enduring Mana Flask. Drop Herald of Thunder and start using Arcane Cloak.
Progress and kill Malachai.
Take Chain support as reward. Link with Orb of Storms.
Buy Arcanist Brand and Minefield (optional).
====================================================================================================================================================================================================
ACT. 5
Not much to talk about. Just progress.
In terms of skill tree you can go for: a) Volatile mines b) Phase Acrobatics c) take ressistances like I did (close to Arcane chemistry node) d) IF YOU HAVE ATZIRI'S FOIBLE you can try Mind Over Matter and The Agnostic
====================================================================================================================================================================================================
ACT. 6
Finish Lab Trial (The Lower Prison).
On bosses set Orb of Storms, Bear Trap, Arcanist Brand and throw mines (use Arcane Cloak too).
Use Soul of Ryslatha till you get Indigon and Brian King till you get 100% chance to avoid stun.
====================================================================================================================================================================================================
ACT. 7
Finish Lab Trial (The Crypt).
Get Diamond Flask and store for later. Check your flasks in terms of immunity. BLEED is vry important (craft it in menagerie).
Finish Lab Trial (The Chamber of Sins level 2).
====================================================================================================================================================================================================
ACT. 8
Finish 2nd Lab as soon as you enter town.
If you have Enduring Mana Flask and got Lab Pathfinder ascendancy on tree you can try to spec Mind Over Matter.
Finish Lab Trial (The Bath House).
Finish Act. 8
====================================================================================================================================================================================================
ACT. 9
Upgrade wands if you want.
Finish Lab Trial (The Tunnel).
Finish Act. 9
====================================================================================================================================================================================================
ACT. 10
Finish Lab Trial (The Ossuary).
Pick up ALL Eternal Mana Flasks and try to roll/identify Enduring one. It's ESSENTIAL. Craft curse immune on it with beast crafting.
With Enduring Eternal Mana Flask you can go for Agnostic.
Finish Act. 10
====================================================================================================================================================================================================
After Acts
Type /passives. If you skipped any points in campain go and grab them. You should have 24 bonus passive points if killed all bandits.
Finish third Lab.
Fix your skill tree to crit version. Start using Diamon flask you saved in act. 7.
Make sure you have immunity to Chill/Freeze, Curse, Bleed.
Buy Dream Fragment if you can afford it.
